refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns the amplitude equivalent for a given decibel amount.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Returns the amplitude equivalent for a given decibel amount. This opcode is the same as ampdb.

refsect1.title: Syntax
refsect1.para: This function works at a-rate, i-rate, and k-rate.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: x -- a value expressed in decibels.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: Returns the amplitude for a given decibel amount.

refsect1.title: Examples
refsect1.para:
